text: James Scott Levine (born August 29, 1974) is an American composer. == Early life == Levine was born in Boston, Massachusetts to David Levine and Lucy Simon. His father is Ashkenazi Jewish of Austrian Jewish, Czech Jewish, English Jewish, Hungarian Jewish, Polish Jewish and Russian Jewish descent and His mother is of Ashkenazi Jewish of German Jewish, Cuban and German descent. ==Composing== Year Title Notes 1990 The Funtastic World of Hanna-Barbera Short 1999 Chill Factor Film (Additional music for Hans Zimmer and John Powell) A Little Inside Film
